rationale: Periyasamy et al. (2015) report K. alvarezii cultivation at Mangadu (Rameswaram). Coordinates (9.3275,79.315306) were derived from ICAR-CMFRI farm site data (Johnson et al. 2020).
notes: Coordinates converted from DMS (Johnson et al. 2020).
